rawContent:
$AMZN $NVDA $AAPL $TSLA for those that think it’s a new Tech bubble. Read

We had S&P selling at 30 times earnings at the beginning of 2000, and the tech sector even far more than that, 60/70 times earnings. interest rates were higher than they are today. Today, we're selling at 20 times earnings, now that's not cheap, but certainly it is not a situation like 1999 or 2000.

rawContent:
Did the $AAPL vision pro demo. Took a few minutes to get the sizing right but then we were good to go. Incredible tech. Spatial photos and videos were awesome. Movies and immersive experiences phenomenal. I have gotten motion sickness with the Meta Quest but did not with the AVP. Heard a lot about the headset being heavy but i didnt experience that although only wore it for about 30 minutes. Spatial interaction is a gamechanger imo.

Thought hard about buying one on the spot but did not yet as i’m not sure how much i would use it day to day in context of the price point. I am still considering and may end up buying one in the coming week/months.
